snippet: “Nightlands” is a memory play set amid the uneasy racial tensions of Philadelphia in the early 1960s.
lead_paragraph: “Nightlands” is a memory play set amid the uneasy racial tensions of Philadelphia in the early 1960s.

headline.main: Astrologist Meets Wig Seller in Simmering ’60s
